title: Hot phone? Here’s how to cool it down (say no to the fridge)
description: As record-breaking heat waves bake areas of the United States and Europe, here is the Help Desk's tips to keep our hot phones cool.

title: Washington state judge rules Facebook violated campaign finance rules
description: King County Superior Court Judge Douglass North said Facebook repeatedly violated campaign finance rules requiring platforms to release information about political advertisers on their sites.

title: Twitter account Libs of TikTok blamed for harassment of children’s hospitals
description: The growing worries about violence have prompted raging debate inside Twitter over whether the Libs of TikTok account should be suspended.

title: ‘New Tales from the Borderlands’ is more Gearbox than Telltale
description: "New Tales from the Borderlands" has a whole new vibe — in part due to pandemic woes, but also because of a new writing staff.

title: Microsoft’s regulator-appeasing claims about Game Pass ring hollow
description: Microsoft hoped to assuage regulators' concerns with recent Game Pass and Call of Duty announcements. The company's spin is hard to take seriously, though.

title: Overwhelmed by your video game backlog? We’ve got tips.
description: It sucks when a pastime turns into a source of stress. Here are some tools to keep that from happening.

title: He used AI to win a fine-arts competition. Was it cheating?
description: When Jason Allen submitted his “Théâtre D’opéra Spatial” into the Colorado State Fair’s fine arts competition last week, the sumptuous print was an immediate hit. It also marked a new milestone in the growth of artificial intelligence.

title: Find the cheapest way to watch TV
description: A guide to navigating all of the confusing ways you can watch TV and specifically for finding the cheapest option for your viewing needs.

title: A new algorithm could spot Parkinson’s early. Will it help?
description: MIT researchers have built an AI model that could diagnose Parkinson's disease earlier than humans, which may improve treatment for the ailment.

title: Arlington offered $23M for Amazon HQ2. So far, it hasn’t paid a dime.
description: Arlington's incentives to Amazon are based on hotel tax revenue, which was expected to increase as the company arrived. But any growth was no match for covid.
